languages.text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.
languages.original_text:
Каждая атака существа уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} цели на 5, а {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} — на 2 до конца боя.
За каждые 2 урона, которые наносит существо, его наносимый урон увеличивается на 1.

traits.locale_text:
Each creature's attack decreases the target's armour by −5 and deflection by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of the dealt damage will increase the creature's further damage by +1.

Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's armour by −5 and deflection by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of damage dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

За каждые 2 урона, которые наносит существо, его наносимый урон увеличивается на 1.

Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Каждая атака существа уменьшает броню цели на 5, а отражение урона — на 2 до конца боя.
За каждые 2 урона, которые наносит существо, его наносимый урон увеличивается на 1.

Каждая атака существа уменьшает броню цели на 5, а отражение урона — на 2 до конца боя.
За каждые 2 урона, которые наносит существо, его наносимый урон увеличивается на 1.

languages.text:
此生物的每次攻击，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低2点，效果持续至战斗结束。
此生物每造成2点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，后续所有攻击造成的伤害都会提高1点。
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
此生物的每次攻击，都会使目标{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}降低5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低2点，效果持续至战斗结束。
此生物每造成2点伤害，后续所有攻击造成的伤害都会提高1点。

languages.text:
その生物による各攻撃は、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を−5、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を−2減らす。
与えられた2ポイントごとの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はその生物の全体のダメージを+1増やす。
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
その生物による各攻撃は、戦闘終了までターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を-5、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を-2減らす。
与えられた2ポイントごとのダメージはその生物の全体のダメージを+1増やす。

languages.text:
Cada ataque que realice la criatura reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del objetivo en −5 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en −2 hasta el final del combate.
Cada 2 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido aumenta el daño total de la criatura en +1.
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Cada ataque que realice la criatura reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} del objetivo en −5 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} en −2 hasta el final del combate.
Cada 2 puntos de daño infligido aumenta el daño total de la criatura en +1.

languages.text:
Jeder Angriff der Kreatur verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −5 und die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} um −2.
Für jeweils 2 verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadenspunkte{/g} erhöht sich der Gesamtschaden der Kreatur um +1.
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder Angriff der Kreatur verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} des Ziels um -5 und die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} um -2 bis zum Ende des Kampfes.
Pro 2 zugefügte Schadenspunkte erhöht sich der Gesamtschaden der Kreatur um +1.

languages.text:
Chaque attaque lancée par la créature augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de −5 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de −2 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Tous les 2 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés augmentent les dégâts globaux de la créature de +1.
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque attaque lancée par la créature augmente l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de la cible de -5 et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de -2 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Tous les 2 points de dégâts infligés augmentent les dégâts globaux de la créature de +1.

languages.text:
Bu yaratığın yaptığı her saldırı; hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerini 5, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerini 2 puan azaltır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Verilen her 2 puanlık {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, yaratığın vereceği genel hasarı +1 artırır.
languages.original_text:
Each attack made by the creature decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.
Each 2 points of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt will increase the creature's overall damage by +1.
